partintro.para: To log SQL actually executed during runtime, an open source log4jdbc(http://code.google.com/p/log4jdbc/) can be utilized. THe logging-sql plugin includes libraries necessary to use log4jdbc.
Install logging-sql plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
